name: Microwave (nemo_dev)
description:
[Headphones Recommended]

Microwave is a game where you play as microwavable food. Embark through the three acts of this epic post-modern commentary on society. The game takes about ten minutes to complete.

This game was made for the ISU GameDev Club 2022 Winter Jam
Theme: You are a resource
In this game you play as microwavable food. Microwavable food is a great resource for college students.

Assets Used:
Font : Digital-7 by Style-7
Wheel of Fortune S-36 E-85 Audio
